title: Brand New Luxury House For sale! BEST INVESTMENT
details:
PRIME LOCATION - Huludagoda Rd, Mount Lavinia

BRAND NEW PROPERTY

75FT WIDE FRONTAGE, TWO RIGHT OF WAYS


CONDOMINIUM APPROVALS OBTAINED
2 story 2 unit approval

5 MINUTE DRIVE TO THE GALLE ROAD ( 900M)


Built using high quality materials
Ground floor fully completed



Ground floor

3 parking slots
2 Roller shutter gates (15 years warranty)
Approx 80ft long 8ft height parapet wall
Malaysian carpet grass layed garden
2 no’s of drainage pits
2 no’s of wastewater pits
Electricity and water meter fixed exposed to the parapet wall
Separate electrical points and taps for parking lots
Space for Driver's and servants quaters

All door frames are made out kempas and doors are from treated mahogany ( 2 years warranty on all door locks)
Windows- wood colour powder coated Aluminium sliding windows
Plug Points for Air-conditioning
Rooms and living hall could be air tightened
Futuristic window designs
Lightened up with branded led lamps( 1 year warranty)
Branded fans ( 2 year 1 to 1 warranty)

FIRST FLOOR
Living hall
Dinning
2 bedrooms
2 bathrooms With shower cubicles ( all branded accessories with 5 years warranty)
Kitchen with pantry

ROOF TOP
